titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain woven fabrics of cotton, containing less than 85 percent by weight of cotton, mixed mainly or solely with man-made fibers, weighing not more than 200 g/m2.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/12/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain woven fabrics of cotton, containing less than 85 percent by weight of cotton, mixed mainly or solely with man-made fibers, weighing not more than 200 g/m2.
